document_data.name: Dagnabbit
document_data.mainbody: '''Dagnabbit''' was the son of [[dwarf|dwarven]] general [[Dagna Waybeard|Dagna]] and the lead military commander of [[Mithral Hall]]'s armed forces, as well as a companion of [[Bruenor Battlehammer]], although not considered part of the [[Companions of the Hall]].
document_data.History:
Dagnabbit's primary role was to protect King Bruenor, a role given to him by [[Gandalug Battlehammer]]. 

Dagnabbit was killed during the siege of the frontier town of [[Shallows]] in [[1370 DR]]. Dagnabbit was crushed to death when raging fires and [[giant]]-thrown boulders caused the collapse of [[Withegroo Seian'Doo]]'s tower as he called out orders from its top.
document_data.Relationships: Dagnabbit was the son of [[Dagna Waybeard]]. He had a daughter named [[Dagnabbet]], who was serving as general of Mithral Hall under King [[Connerad Brawnanvil]] in [[1484 DR]].
